# Visible aesthetics

![](images/clipboard-1005000570.png)

```{r}
iris |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length, 
             y = Sepal.Width)) + 
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
iris |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, 
             color = Species)) + 
  geom_point()
```
